concept.title: Deploy TokenScript
concept.shortdesc: After you created a TokenScript, you want wallets to use it. Learn how wallets can get a TokenScript.

conbody.p: To be operated in a wallet or any other user agent software, the TokenScript engine is required. Currently it is only integrated in Alphawallet and forks of Alphawallet. In the future a library and a web library will be available for easy integration.

If your TokenScript is signed and uploaded to the TokenScript repository, it’s easy for Alphawallet to know about it: If the user receives a token, Alphawallet will scan the repository for a TokenScript and install it.

Other wallets don’t need to implement the whole TokenScript engine or the whole TokenScript. They can fetch it on demand, when a website uses a card, the wallet can download the required part of the TokenScript from the website to process the card.
